meanings.definition: Detailed examination of the elements or structure of something.
meanings.sent1: The analysis of the data revealed interesting patterns.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use analysis to understand complex systems.
meanings.sent3: The analysis of the cake ingredients showed too much sugar was used.
meanings.sent4: Her analysis of the painting's colors brought out hidden meanings.
meanings.sent5: Through careful analysis, the detective solved the mystery.

meanings.definition: The process of separating something into its constituent elements.
meanings.sent1: Chemical analysis helps identify different substances.
meanings.sent2: The analysis of the mixture led to important discoveries.
meanings.sent3: The analysis of the jigsaw puzzle pieces was challenging.
meanings.sent4: His analysis of the music notes revealed a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The analysis of the ingredients in the recipe was crucial for success.
